en_text: For 2 turns, increase ATK by 15% for each Auto-Recover awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: てまエンハンス
jp_skill.raw_description: 2ターンの間、チーム内の自動回復の 覚醒数に応じて攻撃力が上昇。

kr_skill.name: OP Enhancement
kr_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Auto-Heal] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns

na_skill.name: OP Enhancement
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Auto-Heal] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns
